rules.rule_description: 01-Policy duration should be either 1 or 2 years for Domestic Maid Policy.
rules.ruleLibrary: 01-Policy duration should be either 1 or 2 years for Domestic Maid Policy.

uniqueRuleLibraryOptions.name: 01-Policy duration should be either 1 or 2 years for Domestic Maid Policy.
02-Minimum Policy premium should not be less than $1000.
03-EDG entitiled waiver excess up to $1000. Please check Excess Buy Down.
04-Minimum Policy Remaining excess $300. Need higher Authority to Approve
05-Business Handler does not belong to the Marketing Department entered!
07-Referral Vehicle Make / Model, Need higher authority to approve.
08-Vehicle Age is Greater than 3 for ExcelDrive Prestige Risk(Non Mercedes Benz), Need higher authority to approve.
